data.title: Who is the most badass Victoria Cross recipient in history?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 16): In 1960, at the age of 17, my best friend and I decided to join the Canadian Militia. I enlisted in the Royal Regiment of Canada and Derrek joined the Queenâ€™s Own Rifles. As young men do, we debated which of our units had the most impressive history.
